question_text: Which of the following are true about well-known ports? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: They are assigned to commonly used applications like FTP and HTTP
They are dynamically chosen by the client
They can be manually configured by system administrators
They are exclusively used for TCP-based applications
correct_answer: They are assigned to commonly used applications like FTP and HTTP
They can be manually configured by system administrators
explanation: Well-known ports are in the 0â€“1023 range and are designated for standard services. Admins may reassign ports in some configurations. They're not limited to TCP only (e.g., DNS uses both TCP and UDP).
